text: Empower is a service company which operates in energy, industry and telecom sectors in the Nordic countries and in the Baltic region. ==History== Empower's roots are in a company called Pohjolan Voima. Its service company PVO-Palvelut Oy was named to Empower Oy in 1999.http://www.empower.eu/history ==Business== The Empower Group's business operations are divided into four areas:http://www.empower.eu/business-services * Telecom Network Services * Industry Services * Power Network Services * Information Management Services == References == Category:Companies based in Helsinki Category:Service companies of Finland Category:1998 establishments in Finland
title: Empower Group
